Title: WALTHAM SILVER CASED NORMAN ROCKWELL LIMITED EDITION NAUTICAL THEME POCKETWATCH
Description: THIS IS A WALTHAM LIMITED EDITION MODERN POCKET WATCH THE SIZE OF THE WATCH LENDS ITSELF TO USE EITHER AS A VEST POCKET WATCH OR A WOMAN’S PENDANT WATCH THAT COULD BE WORN ON A SILVER OR GOLD CHAIN. THE DIAL HAS THE NORMAN ROCKWELL PAINTING OF THE “OLD MARINER” DEPICTING THE OLD MARINER SEATED, NEXT TO A STANDING YOUNG BOY IN A WHITE SAILOR SUIT WHO IS LOOKING THROUGH A TELESCOPE, WHILE HIS TOY SAILBOAT LAYS NEXT TO HIS FOOT AND THE MARINER’S PARROT AT HIS SIDE. A SAILING SHIP STEERING WHEEL IS IN THE WHITE BACKGROUND ENCOMPASSING THE TWO PEOPLE. THE CASE IS SILVER AROUND THE CENTER RING AND ALSO THE ROPE EDGING OF THE BEZEL AND REAR COVER. THE REAR COVER IS ALSO ADORNED WITH A BOAT ANCHOR ON A FROSTED GOLD COLORED BACKGROUND. INSIDE THE REAR COVER IS PRINTED “WATHAM WATCH NORMAN ROCKWELL P.W. 118 SWISS MADE”. BOTH THE BEZEL AND REAR COVER ARE SNAP-ON DESIGN. THE DIAL HOURS ARE MARKED IN ROMAN NUMERALS. A SWEEP SECOND HAND IS CENTER MOUNTED ALONG WITH THE BLACK HOUR AND MINUTE HANDS. THE CRYSTAL IS IN GREAT CONDITION. THE LIMITED EDITION NUMBER (4430) IS SHOWN ON THE DIAL WHICH IS STAMPED “WALTHAM 4430/ 5250 AND NORMAN ROCKWELL SWISS MADE. THE SWISS MOVEMENT IS QUARTZ AND WAS IN EXCELLENT WORKING ORDER WHEN I LAST USED IT, BUT THE BATTERY HAS EXPIRED AND WILL NEED TO BE REPLACED TO COMMENCE RUNNING. I AM THE FIRST AND ONLY OWNER OF THIS WATCH, SO I CAN STATE THAT IT HAS NEVER BEEN ABUSED. I TRIED TO DESCRIBE THE ITEM WITH WORDS AND PHOTOS, BUT MAY HAVE MISSED SOME FEATURE/DETAIL THAT IS IMPORTANT TO YOU. PLEASE READ ALL AND VIEW PHOTOS AND POSE QUESTIONS/ CONCERNS PRIOR TO BIDDING. I WILL GLADLY RESPOND. I AM SELLING TO USA BUYERS ONLY. NO INTERNATIONAL SALES. NO RETURNS OFFERED. ACCEPTING PAYPAL ONLY WITH PAYMENT EXPECTED WITHING 3 DAYS. IF PAYMENT IS NOT RECEIVED IN 3 DAYS AN E-BAY NON-PAYING BIDDER NOTICE WILL BE SUBMITTED AND THE ITEMS RE-LISTED.
